doc:
William Smith (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Smith_(actor) 0 William Smith (born March 24, 1933) is an American actor who has appeared in almost three hundred feature films and television productions. One of his better-known roles was Anthony Falconetti in the 1970s television mini-series Rich Man, Poor Man. Smith is also known for films like Any Which Way You Can (1980), Conan The Barbarian (1982), Rumble Fish (1983), and Red Dawn (1984), as well as lead roles in several exploitation films during the 1970s. William_Smith ( born March_24_,_1933 ) is an_American_actor who has_appeared in almost_three_hundred_feature_films_and_television_productions . One of his_better-known_roles was Anthony_Falconetti in the_1970s_television_mini-series_Rich_Man , Poor_Man . Smith is_also_known for films like Any_Which Way You Can_( 1980_) , Conan_The_Barbarian_(_1982_) , Rumble Fish_(_1983 ) , and Red_Dawn_(_1984_) , as_well_as lead_roles in several_exploitation_films during the_1970s .
